function.name: send_message
function.description: Ask the user questions to get more information, in order to create a schedule.

question.description: The question to ask the user.

function.name: get_current_time
function.description: Get the current time. The format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

function.name: modify_event_of_schedule
function.description: Modify an event of the schedule.

event.description: The modified event to modify of the schedule. The event name should be got by using the get_current_schedule function.

start_time.description: The start time of the modified event. The format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. The start time should be got by using the get_current_schedule function.

new_event.description: The name of the event. The expression should be as concise as possible.

new_start_time.description: The start time of the event. The format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

new_end_time.description: The end time of the event. The format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. This is optional.

new_whether_need_remind.description: Whether the user needs to be reminded of the event.

new_remind_time_relative_to_start_time.description: The time to remind the user relative to the start time of the event. This is optional.

operator.description: The remind time is earlier or later than the start time.

interval_time.description: The interval time between the remind time and the start time.

interval_unit.description: The unit of the interval time.

reason.description: The reason why the conversation is ended.
